topLevelComment.text: Another great tutorial, I‚Äôm trying to wire sequential switchback led strips to replace the eyebrows, does anyone know those wires on the headlight unit I can tap into
topLevelComment.author: @kylejenkins8830

replies.text: Which headlight signal ru trying to tap? I hook my blueghozt up to the headlight harness in video 3 in this series, it might help depending what ur trying to do üëçüèæ
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

replies.text:
@SquareWheelsAuto thanks I watched all the vids great jobüëç
I tapped into the rear controller inside the headlight unit that‚Äôs runs the factory drl output

Demon eyes
Power Pin 5 (as your vid)
Ground pin 4

Sequential stips
Ground pin 4
Drl pin 5
Sequential signal - ran from bottom of housing (through the rubber seal) to live signal wire in main harness

Mounted the control module inside the headlight housing

Everything working and looking great until I shorted the circuit board now I‚Äôm waiting for a new headlight
Thanks again for the vids looking forward to more
replies.author: @kylejenkins8830

replies.text: @kylejenkins8830 CRAP sorry to hear man!!! just out of curiosity how did that happen??
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

replies.text: @SquareWheelsAuto two of the circuit boards touched and I hear a sizzle, now it keeps beeping, when I engage the signal lights, just as I had figured out all the wires, nothing else appears to be damaged so guess I‚Äôm lucky
replies.author: @kylejenkins8830

topLevelComment.text: Oh I forgot to ask how did you put the clear casing back on? What adhesive did you use?
topLevelComment.author: @Awsometiger1011

replies.text: I just reversed the process. Put the clear casing on after everything is assembled, warm up in the oven, then squeeze together while the sealant is warm and put the screws back in
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

topLevelComment.text: Regarding your power source‚Ä¶ are you able to leave them on in the app and they turn on when you start the car or do you have to turn them on using the app?
topLevelComment.author: @bryanmatthews5827

replies.text: Can be done either way. Check out videos 2 and 3 for more power source options. I've now got my blueghozt running always-on so it can do welcome animations when I unlock the doors üëçüèæ
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

replies.text: @SquareWheelsAuto thank you. I‚Äôm using the Magic LED app Lighting Trendz recommended. Just want to be sure that if I use the relay spot you did and leave the LED on in the app, they‚Äôll turn off and on when I start and stop the ignition without having to use the app?
replies.author: @bryanmatthews5827

replies.text: @bryanmatthews5827 yes, probably. It was LED HUE when I did this video and that's how it behaved. The app/controller would remember what it was doing last right before power was killed, and do that immediately when power was restored.
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

topLevelComment.text: What is the brightness compared to oem I don‚Äôt want to be dimmer than stock
topLevelComment.author: @alvensmith3562

replies.text:
These DRLs are marginally brighter than stock, but still not as bright/bold as, say, Audi's DRLs.

If brightness is your top priority, I'd recommend getting some switchbacks (not RGB) - they tend to be brighter than fully addressable RGB LEDs.
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

replies.text: @SquareWheelsAuto I‚Äôm not wanting to be brighter or dimmer it‚Äôs that I‚Äôve seen some light strips have bright white then the moment you switch to a different color its super faded and looks like crap
replies.author: @alvensmith3562

replies.text: And I‚Äôm definitely going to be giving this a try because I‚Äôm getting board sitting round and want to mod my car more to look better
replies.author: @alvensmith3562

replies.text: Yup when you dive in, make sure the LEDs you choose look how you want em to. I'm learning that all LEDs are not the same. If you're looking for quality LEDs (brighter, vivid colors, etc) check out www.gloweleds.com - use coupon code SQUAREWHEELS. good luck!!
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

replies.text: @SquareWheelsAuto  can I use these on my headlights or should I go to the link you provided on this video to have it already made for me
replies.author: @alvensmith3562

replies.text: I mean technically you can use ANY LEDs for these projects. If u can wait a little bit, Glowe is working on a custom headlight kit for the Q50.
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

replies.text: @SquareWheelsAuto would you say that it‚Äôs better than the set you used on your headlights
replies.author: @alvensmith3562

replies.text: @alvensmith3562 Its still in the works so all I can do is speculate, but I'm real confident in Glowes quality and attention to detail. as long as Glowe is around I won't be buying anymore lightingtrendz.
replies.author: @SquareWheelsAuto

topLevelComment.text: I have a 2018 and my fuse box has a second smaller box, it has the same little black one as you but then it has a blue one next to it, do i continue and wire it up like yours or?

replies.text: The position I noted was one of few that provides switched 12v power when the engine is on.  Should be the same for all years but if you're in doubt, check with a multimeter!
